Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Fayum Entrance Area, el-Lahun (Illahun, Kahun; Ptolemais Hormos), Tomb of Sithathoryunet (BSA Tomb 8), Chamber E, box 1, EES 1914
Medium: Gold, carnelian, feldspar, pellets of copper-silver alloy, cowrie shells
Credit Line: Purchase, Rogers Fund and Henry Walters Gift, 1916
Provenance: Excavated by Petrie at Lahun under sponsorship of the Egypt Exploration Society, 1914. Received by Petrie in the division of finds. Purchased by the Museum from Petrie, 1916.
